title: 95% of votes counted: 33 seats for Blue & White, 32 for Likud
text:
According to Channel 12, 95% of the votes from Tuesday's elections have already been counted, Blue and White stands at 33 seats and Likud at 32 seats, with Blue and White leading by a narrow margin. It is important to note that these are still not the final results.



The Central Election Committee (CEC) has been updating its website throughout the day. The last update, however, was at 22:16 p.m.: 4,030,843 votes had been counted – or 63.41% of the ballots cast.

The current official results according to the CEC (with mandates/seats according to Channel 12):25.66% (33)25.02% (32)10.73% (12)7.57% (9)7.12% (8)6.24% (8)5.72% (7)4.81% (6)4.30% (5)1.87% (did not pass the electoral threshold of 3.25%)The nearly quarter of a million soldiers' votes will begin being counted at 1 am, on early Thursday morning.Based on these results, without Yisrael Beytenu's eight mandates, the Center-Left bloc would have counted on 56 seats and the Center-Right bloc 56.

description: According to Channel 12, 95% of the votes from Tuesday's elections have already been counted, Blue and White stands at 33 seats and Likud at 32 seats, with Blue and White leading by a narrow margin. It is important to note that these are still not the final results.
